PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MobileTelecommunicationsApplianceTypeEUtranNodeB
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsAppliance and types of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsApplianceType with the predefined type set to E_UTRAN_NODE_B.

PropertyDef.Name: DownlinkRadioBand
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the frequency range, delimited by a lower frequency and an upper frequency, allocated for downlink transmission.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCarriers
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates how many carrier frequencies can be managed by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: RadiatedOutputPowerPerAntenna
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the power of radio waves emitted by each antenna of the base transceiver station.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfAntennas
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the number of antennas integrated in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: UplinkRadioBand
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the frequency range, delimited by a lower frequency and an upper frequency, allocated for uplink transmission.
